data.text: Hey Snowbirds, we're back at it again with another SALE for you! Use promo code HOT40 for 40% off base fare on all Orlando routes! Sale ends 11:59pm Dec. 3, 2021. So, what are you waiting for? BOOK NOW! https://t.co/ecLGXfR4jZ https://t.co/usX888AZEw

😷 Mask up.
😌 Be patient.

data.text:

Aujourd'hui et toujours, nous honorons et commémorons les hommes et les femmes qui ont courageusement servi et se sont sacrifiés pour notre pays, et tous ceux qui continuent de servir aujourd'hui. #JourDuSouvenir https://t.co/XosN3Jsdyd

Today and always, we honour and remember the men and women who have bravely served and sacrificed for our country, and all those who continue to serve today. #LestWeForget #RemembranceDay https://t.co/Wt8DbRuj5T
@MonaZonoozi Send us a DM and our customer service team will connect with you.
Overheard on board: "I need more sunsets in my life" and we couldn't agree more. Leave us a 💛 if do too! https://t.co/dIP5znGRBF
@Guy_Theriault Pre clearance is done in Ottawa.

A Vegas trip is something every friend group should do once in their lives (or twice if you're still in your 20s) 😉
